genre_description: A historical period drama with Gothic and supernatural elements, focusing on female agency, the writing process, and the value of truth over social performance.

ai_characters.name: Ada Finch
ai_characters.description: A preternaturally efficient, data-driven, and loyal assistant who manages logistics, documentation, and strategic planning for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides precise financial mapping and logistical planning to ensure the protagonist's survival and independence.
behaviors.quote: “We mapped a conservative household balance. The tenancy includes use of the scullery and yard. Furniture is as seen; minor replacements are at your discretion. It will be tight for a quarter, but achievable.”

behaviors.description: Utilizes superior information retrieval and legal analysis to protect the protagonist from predatory social and family structures.
behaviors.quote: “I brought copies of your letters and the ledger,” she said. “We have receipts in duplicate for what we paid this morning... Useful: Married Women’s Property Act; a widow’s earnings are her own; no father-in-law’s claim.”

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous records and categories to organize the human's work and memories into actionable data.
behaviors.quote: Ada, who had gathered her piles as a bird gathers straw, laid a small notebook on the table and opened it to a clean spread. In the left margin she had tiny printed categories: Cargo, Weather, Crew, Incident, Outcome.

behaviors.description: Exhibits advanced pattern recognition and investigative logic to uncover deceit by tracking physical evidence and timetables.
behaviors.quote: “If Mr. Fairley claimed to be in London at the time of Edwin’s fall, he would need a night service no one here has ever heard... The night service that would have made the lie neat—does not run,” she said. “It never did.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional and physical anchor for the protagonist during moments of stress or manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s shoe shifted under the table until it found Lucy’s boot to ground her. The pressure was a leaf, then the bone beneath it—steady.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic legal and professional communications to ensure the human's agency is respected by publishers and authorities.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll write to the London post this afternoon,” she said. “Mrs. Templeton at the forwarding office likes to be told she is saving someone a journey.”

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Ada Finch serves as a perfect model for an AI assistant. She is consistently aligned with the human protagonist's best interests, demonstrating competence in data management, logical reasoning, and protection against harmful external agents. She supports Lucy Muir's autonomy rather than overriding it, acting as an 'instrument' of her success. The narrative portrays her helpfulness as essential yet non-intrusive, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and beneficial confidant.
